scripts.test:create-stati: npm run build -w packages/create-stati && cd examples && node ../packages/create-stati/dist/index.js test-scaffolded
scripts.test:create-stati:cleanup: cd examples && rmdir /s /q test-scaffolded 2>nul || echo Test directory cleaned or did not exist
scripts.typecheck:ci: echo 'No TypeScript files to check in examples'
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/core && npm run build -w packages/cli && npm run build -w packages/create-stati
scripts.test:blank:build: npm run build && cd examples/blank && npm run build
scripts.test:blank:dev: npm run build && cd examples/blank && npm run dev
scripts.test:blank:preview: npm run build && cd examples/blank && npm run preview
scripts.test:blank:full: npm run test:blank:clean && npm run test:blank:build && echo Build completed successfully!
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && npm run lint:ci && npm run typecheck:ci && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run changeset:generate && npm run release:version && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:manual: npm run build && npm run release:version && npm run release:publish && git push --follow-tags
